OHMIGODIAMNOTSLEEPINGTONIGHTOHMIGOD

Seriously though, I am so stoked for .21

Okay, fangirling session over.
Edited November 9, 2019 by Seelenamt

Wait, what's happening tonight?

The Twitch.tv stream is in 20 minutes, at 10am Eastern.

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/
New space center looks just fantastic, can't wait to play. Also, astronaut complex is amazing.

edit: Sweet! finally got to work on an ipad

Edited July 19, 2013 by -RanZ-
It is very possible that they relase 0.21 tomorrow, as it is the 0.16 anniversary.
Remember the last marathon they had with devs? They released .18 Sure hope it happens again tonight!

They're killing me!!! I'm so damn excited I'm gonna burst.

It would be great to do a 44th Aniversery Apollo 11 mission on the new moon terrain tomorrow!

ERMAGARD NEW KSPX PURTS!!!

for some reason that`s what I`m most exited about(It`s the only mod I use).

ERMAGARD NEW KSPX PURTS!!!

for some reason that`s what I`m most exited about(It`s the only mod I use).

New parts are always good. They might seem minor but people always come up with so many new awesome things with them.

New parts are always good. They might seem minor but people always come up with so many new awesome things with them.

Like a catamaran probe for Laythe made from those RCS pods?

Like a catamaran probe for Laythe made from those RCS pods?

That sounds like a good idea, but the big thing I noticed is that the new adapters are probably going to completely change the way people structure their rockets.

Hahaha, you guys are hilarious.

Everybody is freaking out without any proof that it will be released, but it could

KSP has the best community and the most talented Developers.
I hope the update doesn't reduce my performance too much.

I hope the update doesn't reduce my performance too much.

If anything, it should make it even better. Either Mu or HarvesteR (I forget which) fixed the ocean lag. It used to cause the majority of lag because it generated it in a strange way.
I takes this thread in my teeth and shakes it until 0.21 falls out.

It is very possible that they relase 0.21 tomorrow, as it is the 0.16 anniversary.

more importantly, Apollo 11 Day.

I takes this thread in my teeth and shakes it until 0.21 falls out.

shake haaarder... HAAAARRDER!
But you've seen the today's stream,it's still pretty buggy,I think it will be released next week(not that one which is starting tommorow,I mean that one which is starting on monday 29th).

If anything, it should make it even better. Either Mu or HarvesteR (I forget which) fixed the ocean lag. It used to cause the majority of lag because it generated it in a strange way.

How do you know?

If it's true they'll make me really happy.

How do you know?

If it's true they'll make me really happy.

It's been in either one of the streams or a post. But it is true. Even Yarg stated last night in the stream that it's been running faster for him.

Well they didn't release it on either anniversary...

I'd rather wait to get a decent bug free version, that a potential game ruining bug version.

Well they didn't release it on either anniversary...

I'd rather wait to get a decent bug free version, that a potential game ruining bug version.

They've stated they won't release on weekends anymore. I'm glad they've kept their word. It was a nightmare in the past

They've stated they won't release on weekends anymore. I'm glad they've kept their word. It was a nightmare in the past

0.19 was released on March 16th, a Saturday.

edit: Also .14 was released on a Saturday
